title: Statement by the Press Secretary on H.R. 4994 | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
October 06, 2014

 



Statement by the Press Secretary on H.R. 4994




On Monday, October 6, 2014, the President signed into law:
H.R. 4994, the "Improving Medicare Post-Acute Care Transformation Act" or the "IMPACT Act of 2014," which creates aÂ standardized Medicare assessment tool for comparing patient data across the various types of post-acute care settings for purposes of quality, payment, and discharge planning, and makes other changes to Medicare current law relating to post-acute care.
